extendedInfo.description: Access breaking news updates and thought-provoking content from Eyewitness News and their team of credible local and international journalists, now at your fingertips.In this version you can expect:â¢	All the latest news, as it happensâ¢	Alerts for breaking news and featured contentâ¢	Video channelâ¢	Audio content from Talk Radio 702, 567 CapeTalk, 94.7 Highveld Stereo and 94.5 Kfmâ¢	Sport, Business, Entertainment, Politics and Opinionâ¢	iWitness News contributionsAbout Eyewitness News:Eyewitness News is an independent, award-winning South African news organisation, accessible through ewn.co.za, ewn.mobi and on radio through bulletins on Talk Radio 702, 567 CapeTalk, 94.7 Highveld Stereo and 94.5 Kfm .EWN reporters, photographers and videographers are based in Johannesburg and Cape Town and travel wherever the news is happening. EWN also has a string of correspondents across the country and in major cities around the world. Email editor@ewn.co.za or webmaster@ewn.co.za.KeywordsNews, Sport, Business, Politics, Opinion, Entertainment, Media, Video, Audio, Podcasts, Eyewitness News, EWN, Talk Radio 702, 567 CapeTalk, 94.7 Highveld Stereo, 94.5 Kfm, South Africa, Africa, South African News
